body_html: I'm not in favor of accepting a solution like this. It gives us a false sense of security, and only sort of works around the problem, sometimes. The workaround also has significant performance implications.
body_text: I'm not in favor of accepting a solution like this. It gives us a false sense of security, and only sort of works around the problem, sometimes.  The workaround also has significant performance implications.
body: I'm not in favor of accepting a solution like this. It gives us a false sense of security, and only sort of works around the problem, sometimes.  The workaround also has significant performance implications.
